column3: As much as I prefer using historically-standard KB/MB units in general, this client has always used SI-standard kB/MB units consistently. So ACK changing it (ideally everywhere), and ACK leaving it alone too ;)\n\nOn the new commandline option, I feel we are getting a bit too much code to configure a mere debug log. In this case, it should be just as easy to use your OS's rm/del command immediatel

Removing debug logs is one of these actions that can easily be done in the script that launches bitcoin(d). It's not worth adding yet another command-line flag for. 

Let's keep command line options for bitcoin/network-related settings.
Closing for getting too much NACKs ^^.\n
